name: Space Fireman
description:
This is my first official game I made a while back and I decided to add it on itch.io.

Space Fireman is a fun, simple and addicting physics-based game with colorful, retro, 2D, 16-bit styled graphics. You play as an astronaut who is lost in space and you must survive for as long you can using only a fire extinguisher to thrust your body and move around. Avoid the dangers of space: black holes, asteroids and alien spaceships. Beat your high score.

Make sure to play it on full screen!

CONTROLS

Position the mouse cursor and press left click to propel your character towards the mouse cursor.
